alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Rockingham, Caswell, southeastern Pittsylvania and southwestern Halifax Counties and the City of Danville through 415 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ringgold to near Yanceyville to near Monroeton. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Reidsville... South Boston... Yanceyville... Bethel... Jericho... and Prospect Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
